item.title: Lindeborgs - Biochar production potential, variability and environmental performance at the farm level
item.description: Resources Reference Azzi ES, Karltun E, Sundberg C (2021) Small-scale biochar production on Swedish farms: A model for estimating potential, variability, and environmental performance. Journal of Cleaner Production 280:124873. DOI: 10.

item.title: Helsingborg - Biochar produced from wood waste for soil remediation
item.description: Resources Reference Papageorgiou A, Azzi ES, Enell A, Sundberg C (2021) Biochar produced from wood waste for soil remediation in Sweden: carbon sequestration and other environmental impacts. Science of the Total Environment 145953.

item.title: Uppsala - Urban uses of biochar
item.description: Resources Reference Azzi ES, Karltun E, Sundberg C (2022). Life cycle assessment of urban uses of biochar and case study in Uppsala, Sweden. Biochar, 4(1), 18. DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/s42773-022-00144-3 Download citation as RIS Download as pre-print PDF Presentations The work was presented at a conference and several workshops, for different target audiences.

item.title: Spatial and multi-criteria recommomendation for biochar use on arable land in Sweden
Kenyan biochar cookstoves
item.description: Resources Selected references Gitau, K. J.; Sundberg, C.; Mendum, R.; Mutune, J.; Njenga, M. Use of Biochar-Producing Gasifier Cookstove Improves Energy Use Efficiency and Indoor Air Quality in Rural Households. Energies.
